content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Ms. Müller. I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Before we discuss the price, let me remind you that this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's very close to all important facilities like the supermarket, public transportation, etc. Now, about the price, I think 1500 euros would be reasonable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite expensive. I am a student and I have a limited budget. I would like to negotiate the price. It is a nice apartment, but the location and the facilities are not exceptional. I think 1000 euros would be a more reasonable price for the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your point of view, but you must see that this is a prime location. I think 1200 euros would be a more reasonable price. This is a great apartment, and you're getting a lot of value for your money.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer. However, I think we can still negotiate a little bit. The apartment is unfurnished, and I will need to buy furniture. I also have to pay for utilities. Taking these expenses into account, I propose 1100 euros.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That's a fair point, but I think the location and facilities more than make up for the cost of furniture and utilities. I'm willing to go down to 1150 euros. It's a great apartment, and I'm sure you'll be happy here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding my situation. I think we can agree on 1150 euros. I agree to the price of 1150 Euro!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1150] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Ms. Müller. I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment will be available on the first of next month. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment. If there are no further questions, I think we can end the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No further questions. Let's terminate the negotiation.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
